lead_paragraph: A federal bankruptcy judge on Tuesday approved the sale of Atlantic City's former Revel Casino Hotel for 5 cents on the dollar to a Toronto asset management firm.

headline.main: Judge Approves Revel Casino Sale to Toronto Firm
headline.print_headline: Judge Approves Revel Casino Sale to Toronto Firm
